title: How to Consume Battle Points in Great Little War Game 2

steps.headline: Launch Great Little War Game 2.
steps.description: The game is available on iOS, Android, and other mobile devices. Look for the game app and tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on “Play Game” on the Main Menu.
steps.description: You will enter the missions map. Swipe up and down to scroll through the missions. At the moment, there are 60 different missions available.

steps.headline: Tap the “Upgrades” button on the bottom bar.
steps.description: You will be brought to the screen where all available units in the game are listed. You will see all Infantry, Vehicles, Airborne, and Ships.

steps.headline: Tap on a unit you want to unlock.
steps.description: The basic units are already available for you. You can play the game only with these units. However, it will be more fun if you have more units to play with. Each unit has its own distinct use and features. Units that are available to be unlocked appear in grayscale. A confirmation window will appear indicating the unit being unlocked and the cost in Battle Points for unlocking it.

steps.headline: Tap the checkmark to proceed.
steps.description: You can now use the new unit in your games.

steps.headline: Use the new unit.
steps.description: Tap the “Done” button on the bottom bar, and you will be brought back to the missions map. Select a mission to play. You can now build the new unit from the appropriate building.

methods.name: Increasing Units’ Levels with Battle Points

steps.headline: Launch Great Little War Game 2.
steps.description: The game is available on iOS, Android, and other mobile devices. Look for the game app and tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on “Play Game” on the Main Menu.
steps.description: You will enter the missions map. Swipe up and down to scroll through the missions. At the moment, there are 60 different missions available.

steps.headline: Tap the “Upgrades” button on the bottom bar.
steps.description: You will be brought to the screen where all available units in the game are listed. You will see all Infantry, Vehicles, Airborne, and Ships.

steps.headline: View units’ levels.
steps.description: Each unit can be upgraded until level 5, or 5 stars. The current levels of each unit are indicated by the number of stars colored beside it. Swipe up and down to see all the units. The cost in Battle Points for upgrading a unit to the next level will be indicated right below it.

steps.headline: Tap the unit you want to upgrade.
steps.description: A confirmation window will appear indicating the unit being upgraded and the cost in Battle Points for upgrading it.

steps.headline: Tap the checkmark button to proceed.
steps.description: The newly upgraded unit will have a blinking star on its level bar. This indicates that the unit has just been upgraded to the next level. Upgrading units increases their attack and defense capabilities.

steps.headline: Use the newly upgraded unit.
steps.description: Tap the “Done” button on the bottom bar, and you will be brought back to the missions map. Select a mission to play. All units you build now carry the newly upgraded level, giving them increased attack and defense capabilities.
